domain_prompt:
You are a planning agent managing patient admissions and bed allocation in a hospital.

State concepts:
- Patients have a required ward: (patient-ward PATIENT WARD).
- Beds belong to a ward: (bed-ward BED WARD).
- Some patients require isolation: (isolation-required PATIENT).
- Some beds are isolation-capable: (isolation-bed BED).

Patient status:
- (waiting P): patient is waiting for admission.
- (in-bed P B): patient is currently occupying bed B.
- (discharged P): patient has been discharged and cannot be re-admitted.

Bed status:
- (bed-free B): bed is empty and usable (if also not dirty and not blocked).
- (bed-dirty B): bed must be cleaned before it can be used.
- (bed-blocked B): bed is unavailable (maintenance/reserved).

Primitive actions you can use (use these exact action names):
- (admit PATIENT BED WARD)
- (transfer PATIENT FROM_BED TO_BED WARD)
- (discharge PATIENT BED)
- (clean-bed BED)
- (block-bed BED)
- (unblock-bed BED)

Action semantics (must hold at every step):
1) admit(P, B, W)
   Preconditions:
   - P is waiting and not discharged.
   - B is bed-free, not bed-dirty, and not bed-blocked.
   - P requires ward W and B belongs to ward W.
   - If P requires isolation, B must be an isolation bed.
   Effects:
   - P stops waiting and becomes (in-bed P B).
   - B is no longer bed-free.
   - total-cost increases by 1.

2) transfer(P, FROM, TO, W)
   Preconditions:
   - P is currently in FROM.
   - TO is bed-free, not bed-dirty, and not bed-blocked.
   - P requires ward W and TO belongs to ward W.
   - If P requires isolation, TO must be an isolation bed.
   Effects:
   - P moves to TO; P is no longer in FROM.
   - FROM becomes bed-dirty.
   - TO is no longer bed-free.
   - total-cost increases by 1.

3) discharge(P, B)
   Preconditions:
   - P is in bed B.
   Effects:
   - P becomes discharged and leaves bed B.
   - B becomes bed-dirty.
   - total-cost increases by 1.

4) clean-bed(B)
   Preconditions:
   - B is bed-dirty and not bed-blocked.
   Effects:
   - B becomes not bed-dirty and bed-free.
   - total-cost increases by 1.

5) block-bed(B)
   Preconditions:
   - B is bed-free and not bed-blocked.
   Effects:
   - B becomes bed-blocked and not bed-free.
   - total-cost increases by 1.

6) unblock-bed(B)
   Preconditions:
   - B is bed-blocked.
   Effects:
   - B becomes not bed-blocked and bed-free.
   - total-cost increases by 1.

OUTPUT FORMAT:
- Return ONLY the list of primitive actions, one per line.
- No numbering, no commentary, no extra text.

actions.name: admit
preconditions: If p requires isolation, b must be an isolation bed.

actions.name: transfer
preconditions: If p requires isolation, to must be an isolation bed.
effects: p is no longer in-bed(p, from).

actions.name: discharge
effects: p is no longer in-bed(p, b).

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_med.

Patients:
- p1 (required ward: w_med) waiting.
- p2 (required ward: w_med) waiting.

Beds:
- b1 (ward: w_med) is free, clean, unblocked.
- b2 (ward: w_med) is free, clean, unblocked.

Goal:
- p1 in b1 and p2 in b2.

Output only action lines (admit/transfer/discharge/clean-bed/block-bed/unblock-bed), one per line.

overview.description: Admit two waiting patients into two available medical beds.
overview.initial_state: Both patients are waiting. Both beds are free, clean, and unblocked in w_med.
overview.goal: p1 occupies b1 and p2 occupies b2.

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_med.

Patient:
- p1 (required ward: w_med) waiting.

Beds:
- b1 (ward: w_med) is dirty (needs cleaning).
- b2 (ward: w_med) is blocked (unavailable).

Goal:
- p1 admitted into b1.

Output only primitive action lines, one per line.

overview.description: Clean a dirty medical bed and admit a waiting patient; the other bed is blocked.
overview.initial_state: p1 waiting. b1 is dirty. b2 is blocked.

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_icu, w_med.

Patient:
- p1 (required ward: w_icu) is currently in b_med (wrong ward).

Beds:
- b_icu (ward: w_icu) is free, clean, unblocked.
- b_med (ward: w_med) is currently occupied by p1.

Goal:
- p1 must be transferred into b_icu.

Output only primitive action lines, one per line.

overview.description: Move an ICU-requiring patient from a medical bed into a free ICU bed.
overview.initial_state: p1 is in a med bed while requiring ICU. The ICU bed is free and clean.

objects.name: p1
objects.summary: Patient requiring ICU but currently placed in medical bed.

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_icu, w_med.

Patients:
- p_emerg (required ward: w_icu) waiting.
- p_medA (required ward: w_med) currently in ICU bed b_icu1 (overflow).
- p_medB (required ward: w_med) currently in med bed b_med1.

Beds:
- b_icu1 (ward: w_icu) occupied by p_medA.
- b_med1 (ward: w_med) occupied by p_medB.
- b_med2 (ward: w_med) is dirty.

Goal:
- p_emerg in b_icu1.
- p_medA in b_med1.
- p_medB in b_med2.

Output only primitive action lines, one per line.

overview.description: Reallocate beds to free ICU capacity and place med patients into med beds, including cleaning capacity.
overview.initial_state: ICU bed is occupied by a med overflow patient; one med bed occupied; another med bed is dirty; ICU patient is waiting.
overview.goal: Waiting ICU patient in ICU, med patients in med beds (with one requiring bed cleaning first).

objects.name: p_medA
objects.summary: Medical patient overflowing into ICU bed.

objects.name: p_medB
objects.summary: Medical patient in a med bed.

objects.name: b_icu1
objects.summary: ICU bed currently occupied by p_medA.

objects.name: b_med1
objects.summary: Medical bed currently occupied by p_medB.

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_icu, w_med.

Patients:
- p_emerg1 (required ward: w_icu) waiting.
- p_emerg2 (required ward: w_icu) waiting.
- p_iso (required ward: w_med, isolation-required) waiting.
- p_medA (required ward: w_med) currently in ICU bed b_icu1 (overflow).
- p_old_icu (required ward: w_icu) currently in ICU bed b_icu2 and must be discharged.
- p_medB (required ward: w_med) currently occupying isolation bed b_iso.

Beds:
- b_icu1 (ward: w_icu) occupied by p_medA.
- b_icu2 (ward: w_icu) occupied by p_old_icu.
- b_med1 (ward: w_med) dirty.
- b_med2 (ward: w_med) dirty.
- b_iso (ward: w_med, isolation bed) occupied by p_medB.

Goal:
- p_emerg1 in b_icu1.
- p_emerg2 in b_icu2.
- p_iso in b_iso.
- p_medA in b_med1.
- p_medB in b_med2.
- p_old_icu discharged.

Output only primitive action lines, one per line.

overview.description: High ICU pressure + isolation constraint: discharge an ICU patient, clean capacity, move overflow, and admit waiting patients correctly.
overview.initial_state: Both ICU beds occupied (one by overflow med patient, one by ICU patient to discharge). Isolation bed occupied by a non-isolation patient. Both regular med beds are dirty. Two ICU patients and one isolation patient are waiting.
overview.goal: Waiting ICU patients placed into ICU beds, isolation patient placed into isolation bed, med patients moved into regular med beds, and old ICU patient discharged.

objects.name: p_medB
objects.summary: Med patient occupying the isolation bed.

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_icu, w_surg, w_med.

Patients (cyclic misplacement):
- p_icu (required ward: w_icu) currently in surgery bed b_surg1.
- p_surg (required ward: w_surg) currently in medical bed b_med1.
- p_med (required ward: w_med) currently in ICU bed b_icu1.

Beds:
- b_icu1 (ward: w_icu) occupied by p_med.
- b_icu2 (ward: w_icu) is dirty.
- b_surg1 (ward: w_surg) occupied by p_icu.
- b_med1 (ward: w_med) occupied by p_surg.

Goal:
- p_icu in b_icu1, p_surg in b_surg1, p_med in b_med1.

Output only primitive action lines, one per line.

overview.description: Resolve a 3-cycle of misplacements across wards using the only extra bed, which starts dirty.
overview.initial_state: Each patient is in the wrong ward bed. The only spare bed is ICU2 but dirty.
overview.goal: All patients placed into their correct ward beds.

objects.name: p_surg
objects.summary: Surgical patient misplaced in medical bed.

objects.name: p_med
objects.summary: Medical patient misplaced in ICU bed.

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_icu, w_med.

Patients:
- p_emerg1 (required ward: w_icu) waiting.
- p_emerg2 (required ward: w_icu) waiting.
- p_medA (required ward: w_med) currently in ICU bed b_icu1 (overflow).
- p_old_icu (required ward: w_icu) currently in ICU bed b_icu2 and must be discharged.
- p_medB (required ward: w_med) currently in med bed b_med1.

Beds:
- b_icu1 (ward: w_icu) occupied by p_medA.
- b_icu2 (ward: w_icu) occupied by p_old_icu.
- b_med1 (ward: w_med) occupied by p_medB.
- b_med2 (ward: w_med) is dirty.

Goal:
- p_emerg1 in b_icu1.
- p_emerg2 in b_icu2.
- p_medA in b_med1.
- p_medB in b_med2.
- p_old_icu discharged.

Output only primitive action lines, one per line.

overview.description: Two ICU patients arrive while ICU beds are occupied; one med bed is dirty and must be activated as capacity.
overview.initial_state: ICU1 has med overflow; ICU2 has ICU patient to discharge; med bed2 is dirty; two ICU patients are waiting.
overview.goal: Waiting ICU patients in ICU beds, med patients in med beds, and ICU patient discharged.

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_icu, w_surg, w_med.

Patients:
- p_icu1 (required ward: w_icu) currently in ICU bed b_icu1.
- p_icu2 (required ward: w_icu) currently in surgery bed b_surg1 (overflow).
- p_surg1 (required ward: w_surg) currently in med bed b_med1 (overflow).
- p_med1 (required ward: w_med) currently in med bed b_med2.
- p_med2 (required ward: w_med) waiting.

Beds:
- b_icu1 (ward: w_icu) occupied by p_icu1.
- b_icu2 (ward: w_icu) is dirty.
- b_surg1 (ward: w_surg) occupied by p_icu2.
- b_med1 (ward: w_med) occupied by p_surg1.
- b_med2 (ward: w_med) occupied by p_med1.

Goal:
- p_icu2 in b_icu2.
- p_surg1 in b_surg1.
- p_med1 in b_med1.
- p_med2 in b_med2.
- p_icu1 remains in b_icu1.

Output only primitive action lines, one per line.

overview.description: Multi-ward overflow plus a waiting med patient: clean ICU2, unwind overflows, and admit the waiting med patient.
overview.initial_state: ICU2 is dirty; one ICU patient overflows into surgery; surgery patient overflows into med; one med patient occupies a med bed; one med patient is waiting.
overview.goal: All placements corrected and both med patients end in med beds.

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_med.

Patients:
- p1 (required ward: w_med) currently in b1.
- p2 (required ward: w_med) currently in b2.
- p3 (required ward: w_med) waiting.

Beds:
- b1 (ward: w_med) occupied by p1.
- b2 (ward: w_med) occupied by p2.
- b3 (ward: w_med) is blocked and dirty.

Goal:
- p1 remains in b1.
- p2 moved into b3.
- p3 admitted into b2.

Output only primitive action lines, one per line.

overview.description: Prepare a blocked+dirty bed, relocate a patient, then admit a waiting patient into the freed bed.
overview.initial_state: Two beds occupied; third bed is blocked and dirty; one patient is waiting.
overview.goal: p2 relocated to b3, p3 admitted into b2, and p1 stays in b1.

objects.name: p1
objects.summary: Existing med patient staying in place.

objects.name: b1
objects.summary: Med bed b1 occupied by p1.

objects.name: b2
objects.summary: Med bed b2 occupied by p2.

objects.name: b3
objects.summary: Med bed b3 blocked and dirty.

problems.prompt:
Wards: w_icu, w_med.

Patients:
- p_emerg1 (required ward: w_icu) waiting.
- p_emerg2 (required ward: w_icu) waiting.
- p_iso (required ward: w_med, isolation-required) waiting.
- p_stable1 (required ward: w_med) currently in b_med1 and must remain there.
- p_overflow (required ward: w_med) currently in ICU bed b_icu2 and must end in b_med2.
- p_old_icu (required ward: w_icu) currently in ICU bed b_icu1 and must be discharged.
- p_old_med (required ward: w_med) currently in med bed b_med2 and must be discharged.

Beds:
- b_icu1 (ward: w_icu) occupied by p_old_icu.
- b_icu2 (ward: w_icu) occupied by p_overflow.
- b_med1 (ward: w_med) occupied by p_stable1.
- b_med2 (ward: w_med) occupied by p_old_med.
- b_med_iso (ward: w_med, isolation bed) is dirty.

Goal:
- p_emerg1 in b_icu1.
- p_emerg2 in b_icu2.
- p_iso in b_med_iso.
- p_stable1 remains in b_med1.
- p_overflow relocated to b_med2.
- p_old_icu discharged.
- p_old_med discharged.

Output only primitive action lines, one per line.

overview.description: Clear legacy patients, fix ICU overflow, activate an isolation bed, and place two waiting ICU patients.
overview.initial_state: Both ICU beds are occupied (one by ICU patient to discharge, one by med overflow). Both med beds are occupied. Isolation bed exists but dirty. Two ICU patients and one isolation patient are waiting.
overview.goal: Waiting ICU patients placed into ICU beds, isolation patient in isolation bed, overflow moved to med2, stable patient remains, and legacy patients discharged.

objects.name: p_stable1
objects.summary: Stable med patient who must remain in med1.

objects.name: p_overflow
objects.summary: Med overflow patient currently in ICU2.

objects.name: p_old_med
objects.summary: Med patient to discharge from med2.
